Job-Title: Technology for Development (T4D) Specialist (NO-3), Mogadishu, Somalia, Post # 117240
Description:
The purpose of this role is to coordinate and support the demand for Technology for Development programmatic support. UNICEF Programmes increasingly leverage digital means for effective programme delivery, systems strengthening and monitoring. The T4D Specialist will work with programme teams in the identification, assessment and integration of ICTs and digital innovation into UNICEF programming; strengthening internal capacity to lead and support T4D related initiatives; identifying and engaging with key partners; building business relationships; applying reusable and replicable technical buildings blocks; and maximizing the potential for the scale-up and sustainability of technology and digital innovation for UNICEF programming.

The T4D Specialist works closely with Programme staff and in close liaison with Regional Office ICT and T4D teams, and the central ICT Division where applicable.  The T4D Specialist may supervise local staff members or oversee the work of consultants.

Job-Title: Consultancy - Communication & Learning Consultant for CEED (WASH) Req.#570147
Description: The Communication Consultancy for CEED assignment aims to improve UNICEF’s internal and external communication and knowledge management capabilities, allowing for more effective awareness-raising, coordination, and implementation of the SCAP.  The assignment, led by the UNICEF Climate, Environment, Energy, and Disaster Risk Reduction (CEED) team, will primarily focus on improving the global understanding and implementation of SCAP’s Mainstreaming pillar.

Job-Title: Programme Associate (GS-6), Programm Group - WASH, New York HQ (Temporary Appointment 364days) # 00127799
Description: The Programme Associate reports directly to the Director, WASH and is responsible for supporting the oversight and daily operational activities of the office of the Director. This involves management of information and coordination of matters within a substantive team.

Job-Title: Administrative Associate, (GS6), Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso, Temporary Appointment (9 Months) #125908
Description: L'Unité Administration au niveau du bureau de Ouagadougou recrute un(e) associé(e) administratif(ve) temporaire (TA) dont la mission consistera à prendre en charge entre autres tous les aspects liés au protocole, la gestion des voyages et du transport ainsi que le suivi du paiement des factures y afférentes.

Job-Title: Re-advertisement: ICT Specialist (SAP Programmer Analyst, Programmes and Budget), P3, #21668, Fixed-Term, ICTD Digital Core, Valencia, Spain
Description: We are looking for an SAP Programmer Analyst for the Enterprise Business Systems team of the Solutions Center and Support Section of ICTD.  The ICT Analyst will identify change requirements for SAP and support existing functionality in business areas including Programmes, Funds and Grants Management.

Job-Title: Executive Officer, P2, Niamey Niger (364 days)
Description: The incumbent is responsible for supporting the coordination, management, and planning activities in a systematic and organized manner; managing an effective system for incoming information, including correspondence, decision memos and other institutional documents that together constitute an important part of the organisation’s archive; and lastly, drafting the work plans, annual reports, correspondence, and other planning documents pertaining to the goals of the team.

Job-Title: Consultant/e international/e chargé/e pour élaborer la documentation de l’expérience pilote « District Champion de la qualité des soins » dans le district sanitaire de Loandjili à Pointe Noire, en République du Congo
Description: Le Bureau UNICEF Cong-Brazzaville recherche un

Job-Title: Consultancy - Project Communications Consultant - Global Office of Research and Foresight - 4 months - Remote/Work from home
Description: We are seeking to engage a suitably qualified consultant to contribute to the coordination and implementation of close-out activities related to two FCDO-funded research projects, ‘Gender-Responsive Age-Sensitive Social Protection’ and ‘Evidence on Educational Strategies to Address Child Labour in South Asia’ project. The role will support planning and coordination of monitoring and evaluation, research uptake and reporting for these projects between March and June 2024. We look for candidates able to start as soon as possible.

Job-Title: Consultancy - Project Coordination and Management Consultant - Global Office of Research and Foresight - 4 months - Remote/Work from home
Description: We are seeking to engage a suitably qualified consultant to contribute to the coordination and implementation of close-out activities related to two FCDO-funded research projects, ‘Gender-Responsive Age-Sensitive Social Protection’ and ‘Evidence on Educational Strategies to Address Child Labour in South Asia’ project. The role will support planning and coordination of monitoring research uptake and reporting for these projects between March and June 2024. We look for candidates able to start as soon as possible.

Job-Title: Associé (e) Principal (e) aux Technologies de l'Information et de la Communication – GS-7, FT, Mbandaka - #105474
Description:
Si vous êtes une personne engagée, un professionnel créatif et passionné par l'idée de faire une différence durable pour les enfants, la première organisation mondiale de défense des droits de l'enfant aimerait entendre parler de vous.

L'UNICEF en RDC recherche un (e) Associé (e) Principal (e) en TIC qui effectuera des activités spécialisées relatives aux systèmes TIC de l'UNICEF, y compris l'administration des ordinateurs de bureau, les opérations de serveur, le matériel et les logiciels.

Job-Title: National Consultant for the provision of operational and administrative support for the Better Care Reform
Description: The consultant will work closely with the Coordination Center, UNICEF staff and contracted vendors, implementing partners, provide support to the Child Protection Section, working under the direct management of the Partnership Specialist in Child Protection Section to execute the work products as described in the Deliverables.

Job-Title: Protection against Sexual Exploitation (PSEA) and Abuse Specialist, P-4, Gaza, State of Palestine, # 127886Temporary Appointment (364 Days)
Description: If you are a committed, creative professional and you would like to make an active and lasting contribution to build a better and safe world for children, we would like to hear from you. Our State of Palestine Office is seeking dynamic qualified candidate to join our team as Protection against Sexual Exploitation (PSEA) and Abuse Specialist at P4 level based in Gaza.

Job-Title: Individual National Consultant for child - centered impact, vulnerability, and risk assessment for Zimbabwe , Harare, Zimbabwe, 40 days (Open to Zimbabwe Nationals Only)
Description: UNICEF Zimbabwe is seeking to hire an innovative and self-motivated Individual National Consultant for child - centered impact, vulnerability, and risk assessment

Job-Title: WASH Specialist, (NO-C), Fixed Term, Hargeisa, Somalia #00047145 (Somali Nationals Only)
Description: The WASH Specialist reports to the Head of WASH Section or WASH Manager (Level 3) for guidance and general supervision. The Specialist supports the development, preparation, management, implementation, monitoring and evaluation of the WASH programme within the country programme. The Specialist provides technical guidance and management support throughout the programming processes, to facilitate the administration and achievement of the WASH-related output results in the country programme.

Job-Title: Consultancy: Mid-Term Review (Formative assessment) of the Social Protection Programme for Iraq: leveraging effective response and accelerating reform (International consultancy)
Description: The Iraq Country Office (ICO) is seeking the services of an international consultant to conduct a Mid-Term Review (Formative assessment) of the Social Protection Programme for Iraq: leveraging effective response and accelerating reform.  The duration of the consultancy is April 1st, 2024 to June 30, 2024 for a total of 45 working days. The consultancy will report to the Social Policy Manager.

Job-Title: WASH Officer (Cluster Coordination), NOB, Temporary Appointment (364 days), Herat, #127907 (Open to Afghan Nationals Only)
Description: Afghanistan Country office is looking for an experienced WASH Officer responsible for facilitating the processes that will ensure a well-coordinated, strategic, adequate, coherent, and effective response by partners in the sub-national WASH cluster. The post holder will facilitate communication and information sharing through coordination architecture at the regional level in liaison with WASH partners, Provincial Disaster Management Committee (PDMC), OCHA-led Coordination forum (HRT), National WASH cluster, Directorate of Refugees & Returnees (DoRR) and Provincial Rural Rehabilitation & Development (PRRD).

Job-Title: WASH Officer (Cluster Coordination), NOB, Temporary Appointment (364 days), Mazar-I-Sharif, #127757 (Open to Afghan Nationals Only)
Description: Afghanistan Country office is looking for an experienced WASH Officer responsible for facilitating the processes that will ensure a well-coordinated, strategic, adequate, coherent, and effective response by partners in the sub-national WASH cluster. The post holder will facilitate communication and information sharing through coordination architecture at the regional level in liaison with WASH partners, Provincial Disaster Management Committee (PDMC), OCHA-led Coordination forum (HRT), National WASH cluster, Directorate of Refugees & Returnees (DoRR) and Provincial Rural Rehabilitation & Development (PRRD).

Job-Title: Data Analytics Consultant; UNICEF Regional Office for South Asia
Description:
The purpose of this consultancy is to support the automation of data that is regularly collected by Country Offices. Hence, ROSA aims to hire a consultant that:
1.	Supports the creation of code in open source software that automate the creation of reports, graphs, and tables used by the Country Offices for advocacy on children policies.
2.	Supports the creation of dashboards that visualize the data that is regularly collected by the countries.

Job-Title: Senior Administrative Associate, GS07, Fixed Term Appointment, Yangon #4090 (Open for Myanmar Nationals)
Description: This vacancy is open for both internal and external Myanmar nationals.

Job-Title: Adolescent Development and Gender Specialist, (ADAP) NO 3, Temporary Appointment, 364 days, Manila, Post no. 127766
Description: If you are a committed, creative professional and are passionate about making a lasting difference for children, the world's leading children's rights organization would like to hear from you. UNICEF Philippines is looking for Adolescent Development and Gender Specialist (ADAP) to provide technical and operational support in the Programme Section, providing professional technical and operational expertise in adolescent development and gender and its related activities including emergencies.
